channel.title: Andrew Kirrane's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Andrew Kirrane's Portfolio

item.title: GitHub Virtual Assistant with NLP
item.description: Click here to view the project in GitHub Project Overview Created a tool that can read questions and reply with answers from GitHub’s FAQ section Scraped examples of questions and answers using Beautiful Soup from GitHub Engineered new variations of questions through context and keywords in both the questions and answers Utilized a three layer linear Neural Network to build a model that could answer similar questions Built a client facing flask app and integrated it with a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Client Preview

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Andrew Kirrane. I am currently a fourth year at the University of San Diego, majoring in computer science and minoring in mathematics. Since the summer after my freshman year I have been interested in both data analytics and data science and I have had the opportunity to hone my skills at a fintech startup. In my free time, I like to work on personal projects in fields ranging from sports analytics to NLP and I have a heavy interest in machine learning and neural networks.
